choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Subject: Resignation letter 
Dear [Boss's Name], 
I hope this email finds you well. As you may be aware, I have been working at our company for the past two years and it has truly been a rewarding experience. However, after much thought and consideration, I have decided to move on from my current position as [Your Position] in order to pursue new opportunities that align more closely with my career goals. 
I would like to take this opportunity to thank you for your guidance and support throughout the years. Your leadership has been instrumental in helping me grow both personally and professionally, and I am grateful for all that I have learned from you. 
Please let me know if there is anything else I can do to assist with my transition out of the company. Once again, thank you for everything. 
Sincerely,[Your Name]
